speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Hey Morning again. Sorry for all the paint deleveries yesterday, it must’ve been a little difficult to get used to at first but I’m sure you’ve got it, right?

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: Are customers writing tickets ok? Sometimes they write really poor orders that are hard to pin point what exactly they would want to order and they would pay me less. Hope it won't happen to you.

speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Oh yeah,before I go. I forgot to mention something, today a sweet new category is going to be added to the production catalog!

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: The Bladed Alagomination Sharpster Sharpy! Customers would also probably want to order this as well.

speaker: sad_andi
dialog: Yeah I advertised it for next week......but previous me thought next week was “This” week...I’m sorry.

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: Um, watch out for your fingers, the new robot parts may be a little spikey ;).

speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Don't worry, think about how've you taken care of the orders the past 2 days, just now with another color. You'll do great.

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: Alright I better get going! Good Luck!
